::Battera::

She was still blushing. She walked up to him.  She looked at his 
face, but couldn't look him in the eye. This bot was different, not 
like Rex.  She had never delt with a bot who was so straight forward 
before.
"Yes please." was all she could say.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm grins, noticing the effect his comment made. "Sure, no 
problem."
> 
> He turns and exits the room, "You want me to escort you?"
